critique: The document aims to convey a sense of control and stability during a time of labor unrest. The primary emotions the President wants to elicit are likely a sense of calm and assurance that the situation is being handled. There's also an element of authority and determination to ensure the continued operation of essential transportation systems. The document uses formal language and legalistic phrasing to emphasize the seriousness and legitimacy of the action. The President likely wants to avoid eliciting fear or panic, and instead project an image of decisive leadership. The tone is serious and focused on the national interest.
